LanguageData.D9FSettingsDebugTooltip: Enable debug logging, especially on load. You generally don't need to enable this unless asked to.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyAtOwnRisk: Disabling any patches may result in unpredictable behavior and features breaking. Only disable them if you know what you're doing!
LanguageData.D9FSettingsDebugModeRequired: If debug mode is disabled, all patches will be applied.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsRestartToApply: You must restart the game for patch settings to apply.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyCFSTooltip: Whether to apply the CompFromStuff patch, which allows materials to add additional properties to things made therefrom.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyOTHTooltip: Whether to apply the Orbital Trade Hook patch, which allows modders to create custom trade beacons.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyDRFTooltip: Whether to apply the Deconstruct Return Fix patch, which fixes a vanilla bug which prevents buildings from returning all their items when deconstructed.
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyFAF: Apply Force Allow Place Over Fix patch
LanguageData.D9FSettingsApplyFAFTooltip: Whether to apply the Force Allow Place Over Fix patch, which fixes an obscure vanilla bug. Disabled by default for now.
LanguageData.D9F_Roofed_NeedsRoof: {0} needs to be placed under a roof
LanguageData.D9F_Chandelier_TooTall: {0} is too tall to place a {1} here
LanguageData.D9F_MustBePlacedOnWall: {0} must be placed on a wall
